page.title: 02LAW
page.content: { 0nce there was an assizes in Hindon. Later we had just a police station. Until recently we had a policeman who lived in a police house. We haven't got any of that now. Now we have to phone Tisbury or Mere police stations. They are not open all the time but Salisbury police station is. Neither Tisbury or Mere have their own police dogs but they have their own patrol cars. We don't have any serious crimes or murders. Sometimes we have burglaries. They have a lot of accidents on the A303. They are caused by children screaming in the backs of cars and people overtaking in the wrong place. In Salisbury police station they have computers that can tell them details about burglaries.
